mapper.insert: insert into mybatis.fund_date ( TACode, FundCode, DistributorCode, DateType, CorrCfmDate, TransactionCfmDate values ( #{TACode}, #{FundCode}, #{DistributorCode}, #{DateType}, #{CorrCfmDate}, #{TransactionCfmDate} )
mapper.update: update mybatis.fund_date set TACode = #{TACode}, FundCode = #{FundCode}, DistributorCode = #{DistributorCode}, DateType = #{DateType}, CorrCfmDate = #{CorrCfmDate} where TAAccountID = #{TAAccountID}
